FIELD OFFICE TAIPEI, TAIWAN. P. O. BOX NO. 23 TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, TAIPEI.
TELEGRAPHIC ADDRESS WHITENGECO, NEW YORK
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for Unite States Aid Taipei, Taiwan
May 11, 1962 File Ref .: MSA-33.4
Subject: Excess Equipment Project No. 84-99-471
Dear Mr. Chang:
The enclosed list of excess equipment requested by KIHB and KaHB is referred for your action.
We have reviewed this request and consider allocation as requested to be an effective utilization under subject project.
For your convenience also enclosed is the pertinent catalogue information.
1 Very truly yours, THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION Char Glaubenfor Chas. G. Van Ness, Jr. Assistant Project Manager
